text: Faulty Inner Dialogue is the third studio album by Scottish alternative rock band Kid Canaveral, released on 29 July 2016 by Scottish independent label Lost Map Records.CLash Music - Track Premiere - Kid Canaveral http://www.clashmusic.com/news/premiere-kid-canaveral-first-we-take- dumbarton/The Skinny - Video Preview - Kid Canaveral http://www.theskinny.co.uk/videos/music/kid-canaveral-first-we-take-dumbarton- video-premiere ==Track listing== All songs written by David MacGregor, except where noted. #"Gun Fhaireachdain" - 2:57 #"First We Take Dumbarton" - 3:48 #"Tragic Satellite" - 3:15 #"Ten Milligrams" - 1:15 #"Callous Parting Gift" (Kate Lazda) - 3:04 #"Pale White Flower" - 3:42 #"Lifelong Crisis of Confidence" - 3:41 #"Listen to Me" (Lazda) - 4:22 #"From Your Bright Room" - 3:56 #"Twenty Milligrams" - 1:23 #"Lives Never Lived - 4:41 #"Reel" - 4:43 ==Personnel== ;Kid Canaveral * David MacGregor – vocals, guitar, keyboards, percussion, programming, field recordings * Kate Lazda – vocals, guitar, keyboards * Rose McConnachire – bass, vocals, keyboards * Scott McMaster – drums, percussion * Michael Craig - keyboards ;Additional personnel * Gal – engineer, mixing, producer * Reuben Taylor – mastering ==References== Category:2016 albums Category:Kid Canaveral albums
title: Faulty Inner Dialogue
